review: We purchased the Fire TV to replace an aging Apple TV back in December. We're Prime members, so it seemed like a perfect fit.Pros:Terrific interfaceAccess to Apps like Plex, Netflix, and multiple gamesCons:MASSIVE bandwidth usageNo method with which to restrict video file size when streaming Amazon Prime VideoI really love the interface and the ability to add my own apps, but ultimately I'll be returning the Fire TV and will pick up a Roku to replace it. This device is a bandwidth hog, and the first two months we've been using it we've gone over on our monthly bandwidth allotment.
author: Jason Roach "Jason Roach"
